mapper.insert: insert into USER_INFO (email, pw, nick, address, phone) values(#{email},#{pw},#{nick},#{address}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select event_id, event_name, event_date, event_loc, event_img from EVENT_INFO
select event_id, event_name, event_date, event_loc, event_img FROM EVENT_INFO ORDER BY ABS(DATEDIFF(event_date, NOW())) LIMIT 6;
select s.*, e.event_img, e.event_name, e.event_loc from SHUTTLE_INFO s join EVENT_INFO e on s.event_id=e.event_id
mapper.insert: insert into SHUTTLE_INFO (start_rg, start_date, end_date, price, riding_date, event_id) values (#{start_rg}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{price}, #{riding_date}, (select event_id from EVENT_INFO where event_name = #{event_name}))
mapper.delete: delete from USER_INFO where email=#{email} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.select: select * , (SELECT nick FROM USER_INFO WHERE email = BOARD_INFO.email) as nick from BOARD_INFO where b_id = #{b_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD_INFO WHERE email=#{email} AND b_id=#{b_id}
mapper.select: SELECT b_title, b_date, b_views, b_likes, b_id, b_category, (SELECT nick FROM USER_INFO WHERE email = BOARD_INFO.email) as nick FROM BOARD_INFO WHERE b_category = #{b_category} ORDER BY B_ID DESC
mapper.insert: insert into BOARD_INFO (b_category, b_title, b_content, b_date, email) values (#{b_category}, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_date}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT SI.SHTL_ID, EI.EVENT_ID, COUNT(SI.SEAT_STATUS) AS RESERVED_SEAT_COUNT FROM SEAT_INFO SI JOIN SHUTTLE_INFO SHI ON SI.SHTL_ID = SHI.SHTL_ID JOIN EVENT_INFO EI ON SHI.EVENT_ID = EI.EVENT_ID WHERE EI.EVENT_ID = #{EVENT_ID} AND SI.SEAT_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY SI.SHTL_ID, EI.EVENT_ID;
mapper.insert: insert into BOARD_LIKE_INFO (b_like_state, b_id, email) values('Y',#{b_id},#{email})
mapper.select: select B_LIKES from BOARD_INFO where b_id = #{b_id}
mapper.update: update BOARD_INFO set B_LIKES = B_LIKES + 1 where b_id = #{b_id}
update BOARD_INFO set b_category =#{b_category}, b_title =#{b_title}, b_content =#{b_content}, b_date=#{b_date}, email=#{email}, b_likes=#{b_likes} where b_id=#{b_id}
mapper.insert: insert into COMMENT_INFO (b_id, cmt_content, cmt_date, email) values (#{b_id},#{cmt_content}, #{cmt_date},#{email})
mapper.select: select BOOK_INFO.BOOK_ID, EVENT_INFO.EVENT_NAME, BOOK_INFO.PAY, BOOK_INFO.PAY_DATE from BOOK_INFO inner join SEAT_INFO on BOOK_INFO.SEAT_ID = SEAT_INFO.SEAT_ID inner join SHUTTLE_INFO on SEAT_INFO.SHTL_ID = SHUTTLE_INFO.SHTL_ID inner join EVENT_INFO on SHUTTLE_INFO.EVENT_ID = EVENT_INFO.EVENT_ID where BOOK_INFO.PAY_STATE="Y" and BOOK_INFO.EMAIL = #{email} order by BOOK_INFO.BOOK_ID DESC

select BOOK_INFO.BOOK_ID, EVENT_INFO.EVENT_NAME, BOOK_INFO.PAY, BOOK_INFO.PAY_DATE from BOOK_INFO inner join SEAT_INFO on BOOK_INFO.SEAT_ID = SEAT_INFO.SEAT_ID inner join SHUTTLE_INFO on SEAT_INFO.SHTL_ID = SHUTTLE_INFO.SHTL_ID inner join EVENT_INFO on SHUTTLE_INFO.EVENT_ID = EVENT_INFO.EVENT_ID where BOOK_INFO.PAY_STATE="R" and BOOK_INFO.EMAIL = #{email} order by BOOK_INFO.BOOK_ID DESC

select BOOK_INFO.BOOK_ID, EVENT_INFO.EVENT_NAME, BOOK_INFO.PAY, BOOK_INFO.PAY_DATE from BOOK_INFO inner join SEAT_INFO on BOOK_INFO.SEAT_ID = SEAT_INFO.SEAT_ID inner join SHUTTLE_INFO on SEAT_INFO.SHTL_ID = SHUTTLE_INFO.SHTL_ID inner join EVENT_INFO on SHUTTLE_INFO.EVENT_ID = EVENT_INFO.EVENT_ID where SHUTTLE_INFO.SHTL_STATE="N" and BOOK_INFO.EMAIL = #{email} order by BOOK_INFO.BOOK_ID DESC
